name: in my head (laertespagnoli)
description:
‘in my head’ has minimalistic graphics, challenging platforming, original soundtrack and voice acting.

It is a story about support, dependency and being able to make it even when the world doesn’t believe in you.

Embark in a quick and mysterious journey.

Made by:

Eddie Sugahara

Hector Trinca Espagnoli

Laert Espagnoli Neto

Marcelo Germani Olmos
